name: Darkblack Kerbal Space Program KSP Forum
description:
A style for the Kerbal Space Program user forum (forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com). Light text on dark background. A slightly modified, black version of nbz's Darkblue KSP-Forum style.

Examples here on imgur:


www.imgur.com/a/eLpXv
additional_info:
Search terms: KSP, Kerbal, Forum, kerbalspaceprogram

This style is just a modified version of nbz's Darkblue_KSP-Forum style:

www.userstyles.org/styles/121820/darkblue-ksp-forum

Any comments of "Thanx", or donations, should go to him... 
He's the one who took the time to write 1200 lines of code for this...
All I did was change some values...
